description:
A Seireitei International Film Festival is to be held in the Soul Society, and Nanao recruits Ichigo and his friends to cooperate with the filming. The crew consists of Rukia in the lead role, Renji as the director, Uryu as the costume designer, with Rangiku, Orihime, and Chad as supporting cast members. Will these guys really be able complete the film and win the award for best film?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eiga Da! Matsuri Da! Shinigami Eigasai!
映画だ! 祭りだ! 死神映画祭!
